Entries.NPC.cs.4447: {0}, we're going to have a baby soon.$l
Entries.NPC.cs.4449: Being a parent is annoying, sometimes...  I just don't feel like getting up.$a
Entries.NPC.cs.4452: I need some alone time... Why don't you take care of the kids for a change?$a
Entries.NPC.cs.4455: I was going to make you breakfast, but I changed my mind.$a
Entries.NPC.cs.4462: I got up early and watered some crops for you. I hope it makes your job a little easier today.
Entries.NPC.cs.4470: I got up early to water some crops and they were already done! You've really got this place under control.$h
Entries.NPC.cs.4474: I got up early and fed all the farm animals. I hope that makes your job a little easier today.
Entries.NPC.cs.4481: I spent the morning repairing a few of the fences. They should be as good as new.
Entries.NPC.cs.4488: I ordered this the other day and it just arrived.
Entries.NPC.cs.4489: I figured the room could use a little more decoration.
Entries.NPC.cs.4490: I was going to do some decorating today, but I changed my mind.$a
Entries.NPC.cs.4496: What do you think of the new wallpaper I chose?
Entries.NPC.cs.4497: What do you think of the new flooring I chose?
Entries.NPC.cs.4498: *sigh*... sometimes I miss my old life.$s
Entries.NPC.cs.4499: The weather's too gloomy to get out of bed.$s
Entries.NPC.cs.4500: You could have cleaned up in here a little while I was gone...$a#$e#It's not very nice to have to wade through a bunch of junk after a hard day's work.$a
